author: Shannon Flanagan-Watson
text:
Do you have a whistleblower policy? If so, please send a copy to Michael Peter at mpeter@arlingtonva.us or me.
As we have been developing our new ethics program and related possible policy implications, we have identified the need to add a whistleblower protection to our overall framework.  
Thank you in advance for your help.
Shannon Flanagan-Watson
Assistant County Manager
Arlington, VA
sflanagan-watson@arlingtonva.us
title: Whistleblower Policy
